name: Hide and Skate
description:
First, HIDER has to select the grafitti and write 4 clues as to which one it is.

SKATER Controls:

  • Use W and S to move back and forth on your Skateboard.
  • Use the mouse to look around and Select which grafitti you think it is.
  • Press Space to receive one of the clues (cost 1000 points)

EVERYONE LOSES if SKATER chooses the wrong grafitti OR if time runs out.
